text: Yair Qedar (, born 13 June 1969) is an Israeli documentary filmmaker, social activist and former journalist. == References == == Further reading == * * Yair Qedar at the Israeli Film Center Category:LGBT in Israel Category:LGBT rights in Israel Category:Gay Jews Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:LGBT journalists Category:Israeli Jews Category:LGBT rights activists Category:Israeli documentary filmmakers Category:Documentary filmmakers Category:Israeli journalists Category:Screenwriters Category:Movie directors Category:Documentaries Category:Documentary makers
